question: During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants. Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter • Remind him when and where you met. • Tell him what kind of job you are interested in. • Say why you think you would be suitable for the job.
text: I hope you would kindly recall that we have met on the trip from Ohio to Oslo in Xyz airways on December 22. Thus, as you encouraged, I write this letter to enquire about the job positions available in your chain of Restaurants.
I have graduated in Business administration from Stanford University. Then I was working in a local restaurant in Hawai, But I'm realizing that it do not utilize my skillset.
I would like to take on a new challenging job.  I have good managerial and communication skills which were proved during my internship at Le Meridian hotel.

You would get a reference if you want. Have there been an opportunity in working with you earlier, I would have excelled in My career. In addition, I have a knack for dealing with the business by utilizing social media. Also, it allows me to pursue my passion in management.
I hope you are ok with this and looking forward to hearing from you.
